articles.description: Munawar Faruqui and Ankita Lokhande were seen grooving to Bollywood hits at the Bigg Boss 17 success bash. Meanwhile, TV actor Aly Goni took a dig at the party.
articles.content: The contestants of Bigg Boss 17 kept aside all their differences and came together to celebrate the show’s success in Mumbai on Friday. Winner Munawar Faruqui, runner-up Abhishek Kumar, Mannara Chopr… [+1509 chars]

articles.title: 'Bramayugam' trailer released: Mammootty's menacing presence leaves audiences intrigued | Onmanorama - Onmanorama
articles.description: Directed and written by Rahul Sadasivan, with dialogues penned by T. D. Ramakrishnan, Bramayugam promises to be a gripping cinematic experience.
articles.content: The makers of Bramayugam have recently revealed a chilling black and white trailer of the highly anticipated movie, featuring Mammootty in the lead role. The trailer also features Arjun Ashokan, Amal… [+976 chars]
